revision.text:
<!--철도_노선_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = RailwayLine
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 노선명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종류 | ontologyProperty = type }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = system | ontologyProperty = isPartOf }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 상태 | ontologyProperty = status }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 나라 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 기점 | ontologyProperty = routeStart }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종점 | ontologyProperty = routeEnd }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 역수 | ontologyProperty = numberOfStations }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이용자 | ontologyProperty = passengersPerDay }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 개통일 | ontologyProperty = openingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 폐지일 | ontologyProperty = closingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 소유자 | ontologyProperty = owner }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 운영자 | ontologyProperty = operator }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = stock | ontologyProperty = railwayRollingStock }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영업최고속도 | ontologyProperty = speedLimit | unit = kilometrePerHour }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영업최고속도 | ontologyProperty = speedLimit | unit = kilometrePerHour }}

	{{ PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 설계최고속도 | ontologyProperty = speedLimit | unit = milePerHour }}
end}}

<!-- Not Yet Mapping
|체계 = 
|노선 = 
|영업거리 = 
|실거리 = 
|시설연장 = 
|궤간 = 
|궤도 = 
|선로 = 
|전철화 = 
|신호 = 
-->
